Title: The Pornscape
Writer: Nick Kroll (created by), Andrew Goldberg (created by), Mark Levin (created by), Jennifer Flackett (created by), Gil Ozeri
Actors: Fred Armisen, Kristen Bell, Neil Casey, Richard Kind
Plot: Andrew tries to drown his sorrows in a sea of porn, only to become hopelessly addicted. Coach Steve becomes a suspect in a murder spree.
